title: Update feature overview for GitHub Enterprise Cloud
author: eyalgal
details: Removed two Copilot-related features (Workspaces and Extensions) from the list of unavailable features in GitHub Enterprise Cloud with Data Residency documentation.
Maintains other entries for unavailable features like macOS runners, Maven/Gradle support, and Copilot Metrics API.
summary:
- Removed two Copilot-related features (Workspaces and Extensions) from the list of unavailable features in GitHub Enterprise Cloud with Data Residency documentation.
- Maintains other entries for unavailable features like macOS runners, Maven/Gradle support, and Copilot Metrics API.
